name: Winter night date
description:
In this story you will playing a dude with terrible taste in men and is mostly unlucky when it's come about his romantic life, his boyfriend is a cringe little goblin, one of childhood who got a crush on him has become a spoiled brat and finally that one dude who keep sending him gift because he apparently save his life once.

All the character were created by me ( most of them are from the backstory i made from my character in universe for a party of the ttrpg : cyberpunk 2020). 

Now you can play demo with the intro of the game (the illustation are not the final one and the ui are placeholder).
